author: Tim Arango, Nicholas Bogel-Burroughs, Jay Senter
title: Three Former Officers Convicted of Violating George Floyd’s Rights
description: All of them were charged with willfully violating Mr. Floyd’s constitutional rights by not providing medical care. Two were accused of not intervening to stop a fellow officer.
